arm_length.Description: arm length of the participant (from lateral malleolus to center of target electrode over 6th cervical vertebra)

leg_length.Description: leg length of the participant (from lateral malleolus to center of target electrode over 1st lumbar vertebra)

distance_arm_ringel_stimel.Description: distance from stimulation electrode at index finger (proximal electrode) to stimulation electrode at wrist (proximal electrode)

distance_arm_stimel_biceps.Description: distance from stimulation electrode at wrist (proximal electrode) to recording electrode at biceps (distal electrode)

distance_leg_ringel_stimel.Description: distance from stimulation electrode at big toe (proximal electrode) to stimulation electrode at ankle (proximal electrode)

distance_leg_stimel_kneem.Description: distance from stimulation electrode at ankle (proximal electrode) to central recording electrode at knee (kneeM)

distance_SC1_Iz.Description: distance from recording electrode at XX to recording electrode at XX

distance_SC6_SC1.Description: distance from recording electrode at XX to recording electrode at XX

distance_SC6_TH6.Description: distance from recording electrode at XX to recording electrode at XX

distance_TH6_L1.Description: distance from recording electrode at XX to recording electrode at XX

distance_L1_L4.Description: distance from recording electrode at XX to recording electrode at XX

LQ.Description: laterality quotient assessed with Edinburgh Handedness Inventory

temperature_pre.Description: temperature in shielded room before experiment started

temperature_post.Description: temperature in shielded room after experiment finished
